title: Find a Cure

was just talking. If anyone has me concerned, it's you. You haven't exactly been open about yourself.

Choosing the fourth option will give you an approval down from her. She then explains she has her reasons for not being open about herself and it doesn't concern you. She still tells you to be careful, since you never know what someone is capable of in order to solve this problem we have.
